name: Sonic: Renegade
description:
WARNING: I KNOW THIS IS NOT AN INDIE GAME, BUT I DECIDED TO UPLOAD IT HERE JUST 'CAUSE IT'S COOL.

Sonic: Renegade is an Free Action Sonic Crossover Game made from M.U.G.E.N. For Example, Featuring Sonic Characters, RWBY Characters, and For the first time EVER in an fighting game, Freedom Planet! Multiple Old Characters, Stages, Music, and some new are here for your entertainment! The game is styled after Sonic Forces and Persona 5.
